card.name: Attack
card.text: Deal 1 damage.

card.name: Serf
card.text: Intercepts damage.

card.name: Human Ingenuity
card.text: Your Traits cost (1) less.

card.name: Piety
card.text: You have +2 Favor.

card.name: Miner
card.text: Intercepts damage.

card.name: Stolidity
card.text: You have +1 Endurance and +1 Constitution.

card.name: Greed
card.text: Your cards cost (1) less.

card.name: Nimbleness
card.text: You have +1 Dexterity and +1 Speed.

card.name: Camouflage
card.text: You become invisible for 1 turn.

card.name: Empathy
card.text: The next Minion you play gets +1 HP.

card.name: Grizzly Bear
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy each turn.

card.name: Hyperborean Skin
card.text: You take 1 less damage from Cold sources.

card.name: Domesticated Yeti
card.text: Can attack once per turn.

card.name: Intimidate
card.text: Target player skips the next card they would draw.

card.name: Kobold
card.text: Once per turn, you may pay (1) for this to attack.

card.name: Darksight
card.text: You have +1 Perception and +1 Intellect.

card.name: Tremorsense
card.text: You have +1 Perception and +1 Judgement.

card.name: Swig
card.text: You get +1 Charm and become inebriated for 2 turns.

card.name: Jovial
card.text: You have +4 Charm while inebriated.

card.name: Vampire Spawn
card.text: Intercepts damage. Heals 1 HP each turn.

card.name: Replenish
card.text: Heal a target 3 HP.

card.name: Vampirism
card.text: Whenever an opponent is damaged, gain that much HP. You take double damage from Light and Holy sources.

card.name: Undaunted
card.text: You are immune to Fear effects.

card.name: Minor Zombie
card.text: Intercepts damage. Once per turn, you may pay (2) to move this from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Necrotic Flesh
card.text: You are immune to damage from Necrotic sources.

card.name: Ethereal
card.text: You take 1 less damage from all sources.

card.name: Possess
card.text: Take control of an enemy Minion for this turn only.

card.name: Apparition
card.text: Intercepts damage. Takes 1 less damage from all sources.

card.name: Sophistication
card.text: You have +1 Charm and +1 Judgement.

card.name: Erudition
card.text: You have +1 Intellect and +1 Perception

card.name: Magical Aptitude
card.text: Your Magical cards cost (1) less to play.

card.name: Aloof
card.text: Your opponents have -1 Charm.

card.name: Blood Frenzy
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a random target each turn.

card.name: Bloodsense
card.text: Whenever damage is dealt, you get +1 Perception.

card.name: Combat Strength
card.text: You have +1 Strength and +1 Dexterity.

card.name: Antipathy
card.text: The next Minion an opponent plays gets -1 HP.

card.name: Giant Spider
card.text: Once per turn, you may spend 1 Favor for this to attack.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.text: Deal 1 damage. Can't be intercepted.

card.name: Amphibious
card.text: You can survive underwater.

card.name: Sahuagin
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy each turn.

card.name: Bloodlust
card.text: Your Actions deal 1 additional damage.

card.name: Brute
card.text: Can attack once per turn, but only if you have more Strength than each opponent.

card.name: Footpad
card.text: The next time one of your Minions attacks, it can't be intercepted.

card.name: Snatch
card.text: Draw a card from an opponent's deck.

card.name: Agility
card.text: You have +1 Dexterity and +1 Favor.

card.name: Tinker
card.text: Destroy one of your Equipment to draw two cards.

card.name: Rampage
card.text: Deal 2 damage.

card.name: Charisma
card.text: You have +1 Charm and +1 Favor.

card.name: Enigma
card.text: You are immune to Psionic effects.

card.name: Ancient
card.text: You have +1 Intellect and +1 Endurance.

card.name: Steam-Powered
card.text: Once per turn, you may attack.

card.name: Overcharge
card.text: The next time an ally attacks, it deals 2 additional damage.

card.name: Artificial
card.text: You are immune to Psionic and Fear effects.

card.name: Stoneskin
card.text: You take 1 less damage from all sources.

card.name: Cold-Blooded
card.text: Whenever a Fire source deals damage to you, draw a card. Whenever a Cold source deals damage to you, skip the next card you would draw.

card.name: Venom
card.text: Poison a Minion.

card.name: Slither
card.text: You get +4 Speed this turn only.

card.name: Slash
card.text: Deal 1 damage. 50% chance to inflict bleeding.

card.name: Vector
card.text: Whenever you deal damage, infect the target.

card.name: Wretched
card.text: Whenever you play an Underling, deal 1 damage.

card.name: Flight
card.text: You are immune to Earthen effects.

card.name: Peck
card.text: Deal 1 damage. Draw a card from an opponent's deck.

card.name: Gouge
card.text: Deal 1 damage and inflict bleeding.

card.name: Brutality
card.text: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

card.name: Howl
card.text: Each of your Minions attacks a random enemy.

card.name: Gnoll Raider
card.text: Can attack twice each turn.

card.name: Leyline Connection
card.text: Draw a card.

card.name: Trample
card.text: Deal 1 damage. If your Speed is higher than each opponent's Speed, deal 3 damage instead.

card.name: Centaur Archer
card.text: Can attack once each turn. Can't be intercepted.

card.name: Track
card.text: You get +4 Perception this turn only.

card.name: Squire
card.text: Once per turn, you may pay (1) to heal an ally 1 HP.

card.name: Honor
card.text: Whenever an ally attacks, it heals 1 HP.

card.name: Valorous Strike
card.text: Deal 1 damage and heal 1 HP.

card.name: Knight
card.text: Can attack once per turn. Heals 1 HP whenever it attacks.

card.name: Barbarian
card.text: Can attack three times per turn. Suffers 1 damage whenever it attacks.

card.name: Rage
card.text: Deal 3 damage and suffer 2 damage.

card.name: Reckless
card.text: Your minions deal 2 additional damage when attacking, but they attack a random target.

card.name: Soldier
card.text: Can attack once per turn. Intercepts damage.

card.name: Command
card.text: Choose an ally. The next time it attacks, it deals 1 additional damage.

card.name: Instruct
card.text: Whenever an ally attacks this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Inspire
card.text: Draw a card for each of your Minions.

card.name: Torturer
card.text: Can attack once per turn. Can only attack Minions.

card.name: Execute
card.text: Destroy a damaged Minion.

card.name: Death Knell
card.text: As long as you are damaged, you can attack once per turn.

card.name: Steed
card.text: You have +2 Speed.

card.name: Chivalry
card.text: Whenever an ally attacks, you get +1 Speed.

card.name: Daimyo
card.text: Your Honor cards cost (1) less.

card.name: Shogun
card.text: Your other Minions intercept damage.

card.name: Bushido
card.text: Whenever an ally attacks, you get +1 Favor.

card.name: Slice
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a Minion. If you have 15? or more Speed, destroy that Minion.

card.name: Pit Fighter
card.text: Once per turn, you may pay 1 Endurance for this to attack.

card.name: Knockout
card.text: Your opponent gets -2 Endurance and loses (1) Energy.

card.name: Trip
card.text: Target Minion skips its next attack.

card.name: Dirty Fighting
card.text: Your opponent has -1 Endurance.

card.name: Dragonling
card.text: You may pay (2) for this to attack.

card.name: Skink
card.text: Whenever an ally attacks, this attacks the same target.

card.name: Scale Block
card.text: Prevent the next damage that you would suffer.

card.name: Dragonbreath
card.text: Deal 3 damage.

card.name: Slayer
card.text: Can attack once per turn. Deals 2 damage with attacks.

card.name: Hatred
card.text: Deal 1 damage to all players each turn.

card.name: Vendetta
card.text: Deal 1 damage to all Minions.

card.name: Bodyguard
card.text: Intercepts damage.

card.name: Armor Mastery
card.text: Your Armor cards cost (1) less.

card.name: Shield Block
card.text: Prevent the next damage you would suffer. Draw a card.

card.name: Stoic Stance
card.text: Your Minions have +1 HP.

card.name: Pin
card.text: Target Minion can no longer attack.

card.name: Enclose
card.text: Target Minion and the Minions next to it skip their next attack.

card.name: Warrior
card.text: Can attack once per turn.

card.name: Spellbreak
card.text: Cancel the next Magical card played.

card.name: Antimagic Field
card.text: All Magical cards cost (1) more.

card.name: Scout
card.text: You get (1) additional Energy each turn.

card.name: Messenger
card.text: When you play this, draw a card.

card.name: Sprint
card.text: You get +6 Speed this turn only.

card.name: Recon
card.text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may move it to your discard pile.

card.name: Acolyte
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, this attacks.

card.name: Monk
card.text: Whenever you reset your deck, this gets +2 HP. Intercepts damage.

card.name: Asceticism
card.text: Each player draws an extra card each turn/

card.name: Pressure Point
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a Minion. That Minion skips its next attack.

card.name: Flurry of Blows
card.text: Deal 1 damage for each card played this turn.

card.name: Ninja
card.text: Can attack once per turn as long as you have the most Speed.

card.name: Assassinate
card.text: Destroy a Minion.

card.name: Martial Artist
card.text: Attacks a random enemy whenever you play an Action.

card.name: Student
card.text: Intercepts damage. Whenever an ally attacks, this gets +1 HP.

card.name: Tutor
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Unarmed Strike
card.text: Deal 1 damage. Deal 3 damage instead if you control no Equipment.

card.name: Throw
card.text: Return a Minion to its owner's hand

card.name: Traceur
card.text: Intercepts damage. Whenever this suffers damage, it is returned to your hand.

card.name: Maneuver
card.text: Return a Trait to its owner's hand.

card.name: Resourceful
card.text: Whenever you reset your deck, draw a card.

card.name: Stag
card.text: Intercepts damage. When this is destroyed, draw a card.

card.name: Owl
card.text: Can't be intercepted.

card.name: Wolf
card.text: Whenever you reset your deck, this attacks two random enemies.

card.name: Purify
card.text: Destroy all Traits.

card.name: Moonlight
card.text: Heal each ally 2 HP.

card.name: Viper
card.text: Once per turn, you may pay (1) to poison a Minion.

card.name: Hawk
card.text: Can attack the enemy with the least HP once per turn. Can't be intercepted.

card.name: Sunfire
card.text: Deal 2 damage to each Minion and each player.

card.name: Seismic Strike
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a player. That player discards the top card of their deck.

card.name: Point-Blank Shot
card.text: Deal 3 damage to a leftmost or rightmost Minion.

card.name: Snipe
card.text: Choose a Minion. Next turn, deal 3 damage to it. Can't be intercepted.

card.name: Dual Wielding
card.text: You can equip an extra hand's worth of Equipment.

card.name: Voodoo
card.text: Intercepts damage. Whenever this takes damage, each opponent takes that much damage.

card.name: Balance
card.text: Whenever you suffer damage, deal 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Bloodletting
card.text: You suffer 2 damage and draw two cards.

card.name: Transfusion
card.text: Destroy an ally Minion. You gain HP equal to its HP.

card.name: Panther
card.text: Can attack once per turn. This deals 2 damage each attack. Can't be intercepted.

card.name: Ape
card.text: When you play this, destroy an Equipment card.

card.name: Paladin
card.text: Can attack once per turn. 50% chance to deal 2 damage with an attack.

card.name: Smite
card.text: Destroy a Minion that attacked since your last turn.

card.name: Radiance
card.text: All damage from your sources is treated as coming from a Holy and Light source.

card.name: Divine Champion
card.text: Your attacks deal 1 additional damage as long as you have a Weapon equipped.

card.name: Healer
card.text: Once per turn, you may pay (1) to heal an ally 1 HP.

card.name: Divine Energy
card.text: Target an ally or an enemy. Heal the ally 2 HP or deal 2 damage to the enemy.

card.name: Stormcaller
card.text: Whenever you play an Action card, heal an ally 1 HP or deal 1 damage to an enemy at random.

card.name: Priest
card.text: Intercepts damage. When you play this, draw a random Action card from your deck.

card.name: Arc Bolt
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a Minion and the Minions adjacent to it.

card.name: Thundercharge
card.text: Deal 1 damage to a Minion. That Minion can attack three times this turn.

card.name: Boon
card.text: At the end of each turn, heal a random ally 1 HP.

card.name: Blessing
card.text: Whenever an ally is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

card.name: Witch Hunter
card.text: When you play this, an enemy Minion intercepts damage this turn.

card.name: Cleanser
card.text: When you play this, each opponent skips the next card they would draw.

card.name: Purge Heresy
card.text: Destroy a Minion with "Intercepts damage".

card.name: Hunt Down
card.text: Choose a player. The next Minion card that player would draw is discarded.
